mapper.select: SELECT nvl2(rlike.member_nickname, 'Y', 'N') AS REVIEW_LIKE FROM review_list rlist LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT review_no, MEMBER_NICKNAME, count(*) FROM review_like WHERE member_nickname = #{memberNickname} GROUP BY review_no, MEMBER_NICKNAME ) rlike ON rlist.REVIEW_NO = rlike.REVIEW_NO WHERE rlist.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND (rlike.MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname} OR rlike.MEMBER_NICKNAME IS NULL)
